results.name: First differences of A256393: a(n) = A256393(n+1) - A256393(n).
comment: Sequence gives the differences between the successive terms of A256393, each difference being equal to their unique shared prime factor.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4095
mathematica: If[EvenQ@ n, Max@ pf, Min@ pf]]; s = {2}; lmt = 94; For[k = 2,
k <= lmt, k++, AppendTo[s, s[[k - 1]] + f@ s[[k - 1]]]]; Abs[
program: a257244_list = zipWith gcd a256393_list $ tail a256393_list
xref: Cf. A257245, A257246 (bisections), A257247 (positions where they coincide).
